verses.text: Deliver me, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, from \w the|strong="H1732"\w* evil man; preserve me from \w the|strong="H1732"\w* violent man:

\w Which|strong="H3068"\w* imagine \w mischiefs|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* heart; \w continually|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* gather \w themselves|strong="H7451"\w* together \w for|strong="H3068"\w* war.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* sharpened \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tongue \w like|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* serpent; addersâ€™ poison \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w under|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* lips. \qs Selah\qs*

Keep \w me|strong="H8478"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* hands \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w wicked|strong="H8478"\w*; preserve \w me|strong="H8478"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* violent man: Who \w have|strong="H8193"\w* purposed \w to|strong="H2534"\w* thrust aside \w my|strong="H8478"\w* steps.

\w The|strong="H8104"\w* proud \w have|strong="H3068"\w* hid \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snare \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* cords; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* spread \w a|strong="H3068"\w* net \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* way \w side|strong="H3027"\w*; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* set gins \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Thou|strong="H3027"\w* art \w my|strong="H6566"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*: give ear \w unto|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H6566"\w* supplications, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* strength \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation, thou hast covered \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* battle.

Grant not, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3069"\w* desires \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* wicked; further not \w his|strong="H3117"\w* evil device; \add lest \add*\w they|strong="H3117"\w* exalt \w themselves|strong="H7218"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* head \w of|strong="H3068"\w* those \w that|strong="H3068"\w* compass \w me|strong="H5414"\w* about, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* mischief \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own lips cover \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.
Let burning coals fall upon them: let them \w be|strong="H8193"\w* cast into \w the|strong="H3680"\w* fire; into deep pits, \w that|strong="H8193"\w* they rise not up again.

\w An|strong="H6965"\w* evil speaker shall \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w be|strong="H1077"\w* \w established|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth: evil shall hunt \w the|strong="H5921"\w* violent \w man|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w overthrow|strong="H5307"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3559"\w* know \w that|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3956"\w* \w maintain|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* cause \w of|strong="H3956"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* afflicted, \w and|strong="H2555"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w right|strong="H3559"\w* \w of|strong="H3956"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* needy.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H6213"\w* thanks \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* name: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* upright \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* presence.
